title: The Bonfire Buds (w/ Joe DeRosa & Sal Vulcano)
description:
Joe DeRosa and Sal Vulcano stop by and chat about hotel etiquette with Big Jay.

 Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
